text: “Kodi nchodabwitsa kwa anthu kuti tamuvumbulutsira (chivumbulutso) munthu wochokera mwa iwo (yemwe ndi Muhammad {s.a.w}) kuti: “Chenjeza anthu ndipo awuze nkhani yabwino amene akhulupirira kuti iwo adzapeza ulemelero waukulu kwa Mbuye wawo?” Osakhulupirira adati: “Ndithudi uyu ndi wa matsenga (mfiti) wowonekera.’’
